name: postmarks
tagline: A self-hosted bookmark manager for organizing web links
description: Postmarks is a self-hosted bookmark manager with tagging, search, and sharing support. It offers a clean UI to organize web links for personal or team use with privacy-focused architecture.

features.title: Bookmark Management
features.description: Save and organize web links with titles, descriptions, and custom metadata

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Apply multiple tags to bookmarks for flexible categorization and filtering

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find bookmarks quickly using full-text search across titles, descriptions, and tags

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Transfer bookmarks from browsers or other services using standard formats

features.title: Clean Interface
features.description: Minimal, distraction-free UI focuses on quick bookmark access and organization

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted architecture ensures complete control over your bookmark data
